articles.description: Detroit Tigers left-hander Tarik Skubal couldn't finish five innings for the third straight game as the Tigers fell, 7-4, to the Kansas City Royals.
articles.content:
Less than 24 hours after a pair of big swings, the Detroit Tigers failed to capitalize on a bases-loaded opportunity in the fifth inning and walked too many batters in Sunday's game.
The Tigers walk… [+7932 chars]

articles.title: McLaughlin stays ahead of chaos to take IndyCar win at Mid-Ohio - RACER

articles.title: Dirk Nowitzki Jokingly Joins ‘Overrated’ Chants Directed at Luka Doncic - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Mavericks legend had some fun with the current Dallas star.
articles.content: As Luka Dončić was playing for Slovenia in a World Cup qualifier vs. Sweden, the crowd started an “overrated” chant at him during the game. The jeering crowd included a familiar face, someone who Don… [+803 chars]
